name: Mycoject™ Ultra
description: Mycoject™ Ultra, containing the antibiotic Oxytetracycline Hydrochloride in a completely enclosed micro-infusion system, is a systemic aid in the suppression of bacterial diseases in elm, red oak, palm, peach, pear, and non-bearing pecan and plum trees.

Product Families: Other Crop Protection & Pest Control Products
